name: In the Stone Maze
description:
Lost and stranded in a stone maze, you must find your way out while avoiding deadly obstacles.  Utilize keys to open doors to your freedom.

5 students working together to create this school project.

This game was conceived and created in 5 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.

Ben Palomo ……………………….Texture Artist

Lear Wang ………………………….Animator and 3D Model Artist

Michael Smith ………………….....Main Scriptor and Level Designer

Stephanie Cheung ……………….UI Artist and Scriptor

Yeran Yuan ……………………….....Audio Producer

Fall 2018
